page.title: 04LIFE IN LOCHABRIGGS
page.content: { Locharbriggs is in a Northerly direction from Dumfries. Most people living in this area would not like to move into the town. Most people say that the Uniroyal does cause a lot of air pollution but nobody suffers any illness. The houses are said to be warm but there are some complaints of dampness. The style of the new houses are liked but there are some people that prefer the old style of house. There is quite a lot of shops scattered over the area in Locharbriggs. There is very little entertainment, the area is fairly busy near the main road but the housing schemes are quiet.
